title: 115_hr4515
content: This billnbsp. Amends title XXI of the Social Security Act to establish a special rule,nbsp, with respect tonbsp, the first quarter of FY2018,nbsp. For the redistribution of unused CHIP allotments to state child health plansnbsp, experiencing emergency shortfalls. Specifically, the Centers for Medicare amp, Medicaid Servicesnbsp, (CMS) mustnbsp, redistributenbsp, unused allotments to eachnbsp. Such state in an amount equal to the state's emergency shortfall before the CMS may redistribute the allotments to any state that is experiencing a nonemergency shortfall.
